query: 新星 护肤 抖音 网红达人
answer: The latest trend among Gen Z beauty influencers on Douyin (TikTok) includes collaborations with popular celebrities and influencers. Notable mentions include Dua Lipa launching her first skincare line in partnership with Augustinus Bader, and Hailey Bieber's Rhode brand gaining popularity. Additionally, Medicube's products have been highly endorsed by celebrities like Tzuyu from TWICE, Hailey Bieber, and Kylie Jenner.

Love don’t cost a thing but Jlo first-ever eye masks are part of her $50 skincare kit, which also includes SPF 30 face cream and ABA/BHA serum. It hit shelves Oct. 27. [...] Included in today’s issue: Alexa Chung, Augustinus Bader, Boy Smells, Byredo, Clinique La Prairie, Colourpop, Cora, Cyklar, Estée Lauder, Francis Kurkdjian, Goop, Jlo Beauty, Laneige, Lemme, Lisa Eldridge, Métier, Pat McGrath Labs, Pattern Beauty, Prada, Rigaud Paris, Rite of Way, Sakara, Superegg, Tocca and Picasso candles.

But first… [...] Alexa Chung is Lisa Eldridge’s first-ever makeup ambassador, with a campaign video that launched Oct. 24. This is a great move that establishes Eldridge as the expert for cool, informed fashion women. But it’s also tough to determine how well the products work, because Alexa Chung is gorgeous no matter what you put on her face.

results.title: 20 Viral Gifts You Should Shop This Holiday Season: Earbuds, Haircare & More - Billboard
results.content:
Rhode launched in Sephora this year, giving fans and followers of model Hailey Bieber even more opportunities to shop the star’s line. While the brand, in general, has been well-received by musicians like Ariana Grande and Tate McRae, the brand’s Pocket Blush is a particular stand-out. The product currently retails for $25 at Sephora and comes in 10 different shades, although the fan-fave is Toasted Teddy. The blush is a creamy and blendable stick formula with a medium to buildable coverage. [...] ### Rhode Pocket Blush Buildable Hydrating Cream Blush

$25

Buy Now at sephora

A stick blush by Hailey Bieber. [...] All of Medicube’s product line went extremely viral. The K-Beauty brand also boasts a big celeb following, namely K-Pop star Tzuyu from the girl group TWICE. That has got to explain her unreal skin. If you’re not a fan of K-Pop, that’s okay. A-listers like Hailey Bieber, Kylie Jenner have used the brand in the past, along with influencer Alix Earle, reality stars Khloé Kardashian and Kyle Richards and even the Duchess of Sussex Meghan Markle. Our favorite from the line is the Medicube’s

results.title: Augustinus Bader partners with Dua Lipa for singer’s debut beauty brand - Cosmetics Business
results.content:
The three-strong DUA Skincare collection has been formulated with patented TFC5, a proprietary technology designed to promote the skin barrier and improve elasticity.

TFC5 was created as a new version of the skin care brand’s TFC8 but intended for younger skin.

“I created this skin care line to be my everyday essential – a skin care routine that is clean, effective, and effortless,” said founder Lipa. [...] It also smooths the appearance of fine lines and helps prevent damage from daily stressors.

The collection is rounded off with the Renewal Cream that provides hydration and improves elasticity while reinforcing the skin barrier and health.

Charles Rosier, co-founder and CEO of Augustinus Bader, added: “The DUA Collection represents the perfect fusion of science and creative force.

“I am thrilled to make our proprietary TFC technology accessible to an even wider community. [...] The initial launch comprises a Balancing Cream Cleanser, Supercharged Glow Complex, and Renewal Cream.

The Balancing Cream Cleanser is a cream-to-foam cleanser that is designed to gently remove make-up, SPF, oil, and buildup without stripping for skin.

It works to clear pores, balance oil levels, and refine skin texture.

The Supercharged Glow Complex, meanwhile, is a multi-functional complex that has been formulated to visibly fade post-acne marks and dark spots and enhance elasticity.

results.title: The Best Anti-Aging Skin Care Products To Shop At Nordstrom Now - HuffPost
results.content:
I've been using this oil for years, reaching for it any time my skin needs a bit of extra hydration and love. Made with a whopping 27 plant actives like nutrient-rich and potent calendula oils, cucumber seed oil, organic hemp and jojoba seed oils and fresh ginger root oil, it’s a hydrating, hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic dream. It’s no wonder that famously beautiful celebs like Laura Dern, Lizzo, Brooke Shields, Olivia Wilde and January Jones are huge fans of the brand in general, and this [...] This pricey celebrity-beloved moisturizer starts at a cool $98 a bottle (for the smallest travel size), but that hasn’t stopped dedicated beauty lovers from getting their hands on it. It’s packed with powerful proprietary ingredients like the complex, nutrient-rich TFC8, and the brand has conducted a slew of clinical trials that show convincing physical evidence of its products’ effectiveness. It's a science-forward cream that is rich with luxurious and effective botanicals, antioxidants and [...] Promising reviews: “One of my favorite products. I've used this spf lotion for years now. It's lightweight, doesn't leave my face oily and a little goes a long way.” — June

“It is expensive. Nevertheless, it keeps me from getting sunburned. I have tried numerous sunscreen without having the outstanding results that I have from this one.” — Anonymous
